name: ぼくのBro Boosting Beats
description:
Follow the beat to help your Bro live his best life. Improve his culture, health and empathy skills and see what kind of bro he turns into. But be careful! Miss enough beats and your bro might not better himself at all.

Controls: Left, Right, and Up/Down arrow keys correspond to your L, R, and M buttons on your Boku no Bro device respectively.

Made by Studio Dingwing, members Kyle Toom, Lillian Fulton, and Bri Priddle, along with special guest Steven Zwahl.
